page.title: 06GENERAL HEALTH INFORMATION
page.content: There are eleven ancillary staff employed,four full time nursing staff,two part time nursing staff.As well as all those people,there are also two health visitors.Miss Millington(DR.Hardy's secretary) said that they tried to keep their staff for{three to fifteen} years. As well as medical help,other services are offered;they include: Antenatal care, pyschiatric nursing, speech therapy, baby and toddler groups, chiropody,a dietician and{Red {Cross Equipment}. Many social services are offered;they include:adoption, fostering, finances , child minding, home services for the elderly, sight and hearing problems, welfare rights and services for the mentally and physically handicapped.
